name: Betterment Digital
description: Betterment Digital(BEMD) is a decentralized platform exchange built on Binance Smart Chain network that eases the exchanging of any BEP 20 tokens with lowest platform transaction fees. Betterment Digital Provides DeFi tools for token holders and businesses to buy, trade, swap, stake and secure crypto assets with confidence. Our experts rated the platform of Betterment digital being of high quality swap and staking platform. BEMD holders have access to about the same number of markets and products with Betterment digital platform and we provides useful research and education for our token holders.
